title: Mobile-Based Poetry Creation Learning Program: Creative Competency Development for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literary theory knowledge and ability to appreciate poetry
context.additional_context: Program for developing creative teaching competencies for pre-service/in-service teachers. Implementable in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more modern poetry creation techniques using mobile applications.
Learners can complete two or more polished poems incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can explain the process of analyzing modern poetry and applying it to creative writing.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
